title: Molded Production Unit, "Design 10", 1979
creditline: Gift of David and Gregory Wallance
description: Molded white plastic production unit consisting of 1 soup spoon, 3 forks, 1 knife, and 3 tea spoons attached to long center sprue. Five pieces (2 soup spoons, 2 knives, 1 tespoon) detached from sprue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Molded Production Unit, "Design 10", 1979.
1979. Lexan polycarbonate thermoplastic resin. Gift of David and Gregory Wallance. 1991-81-756.
